data.name: CharacterPropertiesAsian
desc: This is a set of properties to describe the style of characters in Asian texts.

properties.name: CharFontCharSetAsian
desc: This property contains the text encoding of the font as specified in com.sun.star.awt.CharSet.

properties.name: CharFontFamilyAsian
desc: This property contains font family as specified in com.sun.star.awt.FontFamily .

properties.name: CharFontNameAsian
desc: This property specifies the name of the font style.
It may contain more than one name separated by comma.

properties.name: CharFontPitchAsian
desc: This property contains the font pitch as specified in com.sun.star.awt.FontPitch.

properties.name: CharFontStyleNameAsian
desc: This property contains the name of the font style.

properties.name: CharHeightAsian
desc: This value contains the height of the characters in point.

properties.name: CharLocaleAsian
desc: contains the value of the locale.

properties.name: CharPostureAsian
desc: This property contains the value of the posture of the document.

properties.name: CharWeightAsian
desc: This property contains the value of the font weight.
